an incredibly solid rpg beautifully animated and drawn with a surprisingly high skill ceiling  story isnt the most adventurous or unique but there is nothing more satisfying than upgrading your party and finally taking down those freaking airships that wander the map  lots of sidecontent to go with the main story item crafting enchanting fishing sidequests collectibles and dungeon difficultly settings to keep things at the level you want them

the black swordsman devling to be betrayed by someone you trust is the worst thing in the worldbut even in the depths of this darkness flowers can bloom dont be afraid embrace the darkness start to grow in this darkness thrive in it nothing can stop me once ive drawn my sword from here it is my fateto live my life to the fullest even if its the last thing i do   rallos zek only the strong shall survive
good

an original feeling rpg that feels like the kind of game i would have popped into my old console as a kid and got totally lost in this is a fun game with great visuals and voice acting combat is just like any other rpg of its kind but still feels new and fun with its own original spin on it the story is ok but it feels like you are dropped into a whole world with little to no real backstory so bring your own headcanon and have a blast playing this fun rpg
pretty good mix of exploration and fighting could use some animation skip things and minor balance tweaks its nice you can bypass lower level fights if you are high enough

nightwar isnt overly innovative but its still nonetheless a fun and quirky rpg with likeable characters i first came to battlechasers after playing the ruined king  another game by the same developer  and you can see the inspiration the ruined king drew from their earlier game albeit improved
is a great game art is dope creating a good team is fun and i didnt notice any heavy grind its slow though so way better with a speedhack
fun fast passed turned based rpg fun
